title: What K-pop song do you like just because of one word in the lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: To me i started listening to these to hear that word. I am not a fan of these songs but I love the chorus😉 HELICOPTER PSYCHO ZIMZALABIM DEJA VU NEW THANGS Now the following one is really nice.i checked it out because of its name and fell in love with it. MAGNETIC by monstaX  I wish you all will like it. Bye💜

BTS's Make it right because of the name. Exo's Promise because of the “Promise" word SNSD's Into the new world because of this word in the lyrics “Forever” Taeyeon's Happy for " Happy” word. Baekhyun's Happy OST song same for the “Happy" song. Chen's beautiful goodbye because of the word “Us” Agust D's Give it to me because of the word “success"
